name: MYC_LQL_SCORE_RNG
description: Stores information about scoring questions related to specific score ranges and what is displayed to patients and providers.

columns.name: QUESTION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the question record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: SCOREDISP_LOW_RNG
columns.description: lower bound for this score range

columns.name: SCOREDISP_UPR_RNG
columns.description: upper bound for this score range

columns.name: SCOREDISP_PAT_TEXT
columns.description: HTML to display to patient for given score range

columns.name: SCOREDISP_RNG_DESC
columns.description: a short description of what this score range means
